p: Safety of p-synephrine was investigated by Ratamess et al. [ 66] on humans, animals, and in vitro. Authors reported over 30 human studies indicating that the cardiovascular effects of p-synephrine and bitter orange extracts are clinically insignificant. p-Synephrine showed a greater ability to bind adrenergic receptors in rodents than in humans, and the data in literature on its effects on animals cannot be indicative for men at commonly used doses.
